title: The Master's Tale, A Titanic Ghost Story
description: Haunted by his final voyage, shackled to a place beyond time, only the truth can set Titanic's master free.Captain Smith's spirit relives his past: the ships he sailed, the women he loved, his rise from obscurity to one of the worldâ€™s finest mariners.Until bad luck and coincidence turn against him:Fire rages below decks, a Jonah among his passengers predicts doom, a mysterious young woman evokes the love he had to leave behind.Burdened by guilt, Captain Smith makes the voyage again, seeking his fatal mistake. As the past fuses into his eternal present, the truth is, at last, revealed.Uncovering dramatic and little known events, Ann Victoria Roberts explores themes of time and coincidence in her haunting new novel based on the life of Captain Edward Smith.
author: Ann Victoria Roberts
